payload.content: Anything that can be done within the Obsidian application interface can also be accomplished from the command line.

name: Anything that can be done within the Obsidian application interface can also be
content: Anything that can be done within the Obsidian application interface can also be accomplished from the command line.

payload.content: Obsidian CLI is now available in Obsidian version 1.12 (early access).

name: Obsidian CLI is now available in Obsidian version 1.12 (early access).
content: Obsidian CLI is now available in Obsidian version 1.12 (early access).

payload.content: Obsidian CLI provides commands such as 'aliases' (list aliases), 'append' (append content to a file), 'backlinks' (list backlinks), 'basiccreate' (create new item), 'backup' (backup vault), 'baseviews' (list views), 'bases' (list base files), 'bookmark' (add bookmark), 'bookmarks' (list bookmarks), 'command' (execute Obsidian command), 'task' (show/update task), and 'tasks' (list tasks).

name: Obsidian CLI provides commands such as 'aliases' (list aliases), 'append' (appen
content: Obsidian CLI provides commands such as 'aliases' (list aliases), 'append' (append content to a file), 'backlinks' (list backlinks), 'basiccreate' (create new item), 'backup' (backup vault), 'baseviews' (list views), 'bases' (list base files), 'bookmark' (add bookmark), 'bookmarks' (list bookmarks), 'command' (execute Obsidian command), 'task' (show/update task), and 'tasks' (list tasks).
